name: "Tailor" Vest in Charcoal Linen Sz Small
description: We love our new tailored-style vest! This piece incorporates elements of both draping & tailoring to provide a beautiful intersection of these different forms of construction. Asymmetrical in cut & style, this vest features a one-button closure, at which the right side shows off its unique "lapel." Shorter in the back, than in the front, this piece gives the wearer a wonderful shape. This piece will fit a women's size S. Wear it out over your favorite tee & you've got an outfit like no other! 100% Linen. Color is a blue-grey charcoal, with a textured weave. Please keep in mind that all WhiteWash collection pieces are one-of-a-kind and are undupliacatable, and many pieces have raw edges to highlight the material qualities of each item. If there is risk of fraying, edges are reinforced with thread (in this case a subtle contrast black). Happy to ship internationally upon request. Please contact us with any questions you might have!

name: Lapel Tunic in Copper Cotton Jersey & Chocolate Wool Knit
description: This extra long tunic-top was made for the legging-lover in mind, Constructed in a lovely organic cotton copper knit jersey for the back, and a thicker knit chocolate wool for the front. This item features an elegant draped neckline, with an asymmetrical "lapel" on the right side. Sewn with a tap closure, this piece is intended to be thrown on over any outfit to add a bit more warmth, texture, and of course-interest. Cap sleeves drape over the wearer's shoulders onto the arms. Back is slightly sheer (a.k.a wear an undershirt). Please keep in mind that all WhiteWash collection pieces are one-of-a-kind and are undupliacatable, and many pieces have raw edges to highlight the material qualities of each item. If there is risk of fraying, edges are reinforced with thread (in this case there is no need because of the knit). Happy to ship internationally upon request. Please contact us with any questions you might have!

name: World Knot Top Drape Shirt/Sweater/Cardigan in Rust
description:
The world knot top is a WhiteWash Studio staple. One of our favorite designs, the world knot top is a great basic piece for any wardrobe. Unisex, this piece is made to order to your specifications. Available in array of fabrics & colors; customize this handmade piece to your liking. This top is constructed with a long draped front that you can wear in many ways. This cut is versatile, comfortable, and easy to wear for any & every day.

If you would like a list of the current season's materials and colors, please contact us!

Happy to ship internationally by request. Contact us for a quote.

name: Wool Herringbone Poncho w/ Vintage French Military Buttons O/S
description:
This poncho is constructed out of a black & taupe herringbone wool. A perfect layering piece for any season! This classic shape is given a twist with a varying proportioned "sleeve" and an asymmetrical collar & shoulder. One side has a sort of lapel, while the other is a simple upturned selvedge edge. This one of a kind piece is One Size, but would fit sizes S-M-L best. Single button closure in front, closes at 3/4 length cuffs with vintage French military brass buttons. Two front patch pockets to toss your cell phone! Wonderful rich medium brown, beige, and black color tones. 100% Virgin Wool. Pair this baby with a pair of Wellingtons & you're set to go!

Please keep in mind that all WhiteWash collection pieces are one-of-a-kind and are undupliacatable, and many pieces have raw edges to highlight the material qualities of each item. If there is risk of fraying, edges are reinforced with thread (in this case raw edges are finished in a simple hem with the exception of selvedge edges). Happy to ship internationally upon request. Please contact us with any questions you might have!

name: Draped Crop Tee in Sterling Grey 4-Ply Silk Sz Small
description: Deliciously luscious crop-top tee shirt-except this one is made out of 4-ply silk! A cap-sleeve with a kimono shoulder upgrade this basic style to a more elegant playing field. You have to feel this material to believe its texture.This top incorporates elements of both draping & tailoring to provide a beautiful intersection of these different forms of construction. This piece will fit a women's size S. Wear it out with almost anything as it is versatile in its ability to be camouflaged as casual & formal. However you wear it, enjoy its supple nature! 100% Silk. Color is a subtle luminescent sterling grey, with a slight textured weave. Please keep in mind that all WhiteWash collection pieces are one-of-a-kind and are undupliacatable, and many pieces have raw edges to highlight the material qualities of each item. If there is risk of fraying, edges are reinforced with thread (in this case edges are finished with simple hems). Happy to ship internationally upon request. Please contact us with any questions you might have!
